sentences.en: Aim To study the dispersion of individual CCD pixels and its rectification.
sentences.cn: 目的研究CCD各 像元之间的暗电流和响应不一致性的矫正方法.

sentences.en: Anyway , there must be another rectification the year after next.
At last the thesis describes the installment and rectification of the system.
sentences.cn: 论文最后简述了系统的安装和调试情况.

sentences.en: Dumping is an unjust trade practice, of which antidumping constitutes rectification.
sentences.cn: 倾销是不公平的贸易做法, 而反倾销则是对这种不公平做法的矫正.

sentences.en: Methods A random sampling inspection could be combined with special - purpose rectification.
sentences.cn: 方法突击抽样检查和专项整顿相结合,抽样比对.

sentences.en: One should understand that rectification requires one's own painstaking effort.
sentences.cn: 要知道整风主要靠自己下苦功夫.

sentences.en: Rectification means correcting one's way of thinking and style of work.
sentences.cn: 整风就是整顿思想作风和工作作风.

sentences.en: The current rectification is like a dose of alum.
sentences.cn: 这次整风,就是放一把明矾.

sentences.en: The phase debugging method of the thyristor rectification circuit is introduced.
sentences.cn: 给出晶闸管整流电路的相位调试方法.

sentences.en: The process of producing a shift of the average value is called rectification.
sentences.cn: 产生平均值移动的过程叫做整流.

sentences.en: The rectification has to be conducted in every factory and agricultural co - operative .
sentences.cn: 这个整风,每个工厂,每个 合作社 都要搞.

sentences.en: The Yenan rectification and the sinicization of Marxism have close relationship.
sentences.cn: 延安整风与马克思主义中国化有着密切的关系.

sentences.en: This effect, in analogy to its radiofrequency counterpart, is known as optical rectification.
sentences.cn: 同它的射频对应物相仿, 这种现象称为光学整流.

sentences.en: This provides a favourable conditions for rectification of tall oil.
sentences.cn: 为塔尔油的精馏创造了有利条件.

sentences.en: To be responsible for the rectification and closure of coal mines.
sentences.cn: 负责指导煤矿整顿关闭工作.

words.tran_cn: [化工] 可精馏的；可矫正的；可改正的
改正的，整流的；精馏过的
[电] 整流器；改正者，矫正者
调整；矫正；精馏（rectify的过去分词形式）
改正，矫正；[化工]精馏；[电]整流；[数]求长

trans.tran_cn: 矫正，<电>整流，<化>精馏，<数>求长
trans.tran_en: The rectification of something that is wrong is the act of changing it to make it correct or satisfactory
